text_block_list.text:
Sakura Bakushin O managed to finish the 
Twinkle Series in style.

We were able to get through the very 
important "first three years" together――

One day, I was basking in the afterglow 
of such a big milestone.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Trainer! 
It's over this way, this way this way!

Sakura Bakushin O had invited me to
visit a shrine.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
The sakura mochi here is aaaabsolutely 
delicious! 
You're almost sure to be completely and 
totally amazed!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I'll go and get you one, just wait one
minute!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Nono! It's a thank-you day for Trainer,
so I'll do it!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: As such…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Please lend me some money!! 
I have forgotten my wallet!!

Sakura Bakushin O bought me some sakura
mochi, which was, indeed, delicious,
with a little hint of sweetness.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Haaah, this place takes the first place
cake for sakura mochi!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
It's almost as perfect as my mom's 
homemade ones. It's superb!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Affirmative! 
She is an excellent mother to me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I've actually been thinking about
something. I haven't told anyone about
it yet, but…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Sakura mochi is one of the best rice
cakes in the world, isn't it?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Could it be, perhaps they're…… 
named after me!?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In honor of me, a top class person, 
it was dubbed "Sakura" mochi, don't 
you think…?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
When you think about it, somehow it
makes it taste even better!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Surely, that's how my mother felt when 
she made it for me.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And surely, even now she's still
waiting, kneading rice cakes.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
I hope that I can be a shining example
to you all…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm already a pretty amazing, 
exemplary role model!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
But, it was Trainer who helped me grow 
even more.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
To be honest, there were times when I 
doubted Trainer on the way.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Does my Trainer want me to stay on the 
short track forever, just like everyone 
else? I wondered.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Despite that, I decided to trust
Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
And it's because of that that I've been
able to run this far.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
In fact, I ran the whole 3600 meters! 
I think I set quite the good example!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Please, let me ask you one thing.

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text: Trainer, you believe in me, don't you?

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Spring and Autumn Tennoushou, Arima 
Kinen, and so on…

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
You believe I can win all those other 
races… don't you?

I could answer that question without any 
hesitation.

If she can keep up her speed and get
off to a fast start, no one else will be
able to catch up…

I'm sure she'll be able to win any race 
thrown at her… Someday!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Fufu, I only wanted to hear you say it 
properly!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Then, thank you for your continued 
support of me!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
Let's aim for complete domination of the 
Bakushin Road! 
Onwaaaards―!

text_block_list.name: Sakura Bakushin O
text_block_list.text:
We're going to Bakushin together, you
and me, until we win our dream!
